"""make sure exceptions raise for bad auth patterns"""
with pytest.raises(exceptions.InvalidAuth):
    bad_news_df = news.company_news_intrinio(self.good_ticker)
with pytest.raises(exceptions.InvalidAuth):
    bad_news_df = news.company_news_intrinio(self.good_ticker, username=
        'fake', password='fake', public_key='fake')
